title: Figure Title
description: This lab will guide you through the process of creating figures with titles, subtitles, and global labels using the Matplotlib library in Python. You will learn how to create different types of oscillation plots and how to add a global x- or y-label to a figure.

steps.title: Create a damped and undamped oscillation plot

verify.hint: You need to practice coding in figure-title.ipynb

steps.title: Add global x- and y-labels to a figure
